title: Competitive:Rapid Blaster
paragraphs: Gear abilities provide different effects in battle that benefit the player with their equipped weapon. This is a guide to gear abilities in relation to the weapon. Strategy, synergy, viability, and purpose may be written here.
The Rapid Blaster is a midline weapon with good range, fire rate, and damage. Ink Mines can be used to set traps for opponents, and Triple Inkstrike can be used to displace them.
